mean_cn: n. 中值，中位数，中线；  adj. 中值的，中央的
mean_en: having a value that is in the middle of a series of values arranged from smallest to largest
word_etyma: medi中间+an形容词后缀 → 中央的
short_phrase: the median weight in the center
sentence: Half of adult women weigh more than the median weight, half less.
sentence_trans: 一半的成年妇女比中等体重重，另一半比中等体重轻。
